The image was identified as a composite: 2. The cloud formation in the image was taken from a real photograph by Jason Weingart, which was then flipped upside down and inserted into the image of Pensacola Beach.
Brent Shavnore confirmed on his Facebook: 4. Shavnore mentioned in the comments that he extensively edited the image, including flipping the sky upside down and using various editing techniques such as gradient filters and dodging and burning.
